sentences.english: As the new semester starts, i adapted the mood of soldiers going for war to Kampar…
sentences.chinese: 新的学期开始了，我带着兵士出征的心情前往金宝。

sentences.english: Among those declining to join the initiative was Campbell.
sentences.chinese: 金宝是那些不愿加入倡议的公司之一。

sentences.english: At a battle scene, Chien-Po found General Li's helmet.
sentences.chinese: 在地上，金宝发现了李将军的头盔。

sentences.english: Chen Peng flies to Jin Bao's patriarch gentleman, also be in the sainted that express altar.
sentences.chinese: 金宝的创办人陈鹏飞先生，也在表坛德高望重。

sentences.english: Campbell has promised to become more real.
sentences.chinese: 金宝汤承诺要变得更加纯正。
